message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe is truly exceptional. I'm confident it will bring great value to you. Given its quality and uniqueness, I propose a price of $150 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can make this transaction happen.

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in its value. After considering its potential benefits, I believe I can offer a fair price of $120 for it. I hope this aligns better with my budget and we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to meet within my valuation range. In light of that, I would like to propose a revised price of $140 for the product. This price reflects a compromise while still allowing me to achieve a satisfactory return for our efforts in developing and sourcing such a high-quality item. I hope this proposal is more aligned with what you're looking for, and we can move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price, Alice. After further consideration, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the value of the product and my budget constraints. I look forward to your response and hope we can come to an agreement.
